I was saddened to wake up to the news this morning that LTC James Megellas has passed away. He was one hell of a soldier, Mr 82nd, a man who was the true embodiment of the Division. At 103 he had a great innings, and influenced many people. RIP Maggie, AATW!  https://t.co/nXSyVjeEQk

I want to join with @adriandix to thank all the @HospEmpUnion health care workers who so lovingly looked after my father-in-law until he passed away in LTC last night. And thank you to Adrian’s staff who are no doubt putting in insane hours to stop this.

@waltshaub It gives me nightmares, Walt. I was an RN in LTC during H1N1 & we were all trained within 2 weeks of it being declared.  This is beyond reckless & depraved.  For the 1st time, I truly wish I didn't know what I know.  I'm so tired of my heart breaking.  All. Those. People.
